author: dseith
body:
fixed the flight Distance variables in the training of the DeepCSV_PhaseII model. 

Despite the weights of the model, also the offsets and scales for the flightDistance variables have changed:

https://github.com/dseith/RecoBTag-Combined/blob/966f9531ab99acb7396378c199b4a4ccb3937b1e/DeepCSV_PhaseII.json#L315
https://github.com/dseith/RecoBTag-Combined/blob/966f9531ab99acb7396378c199b4a4ccb3937b1e/DeepCSV_PhaseII.json#L320
https://github.com/dseith/RecoBTag-Combined/blob/966f9531ab99acb7396378c199b4a4ccb3937b1e/DeepCSV_PhaseII.json#L325
https://github.com/dseith/RecoBTag-Combined/blob/966f9531ab99acb7396378c199b4a4ccb3937b1e/DeepCSV_PhaseII.json#L330

See also here: https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/26072#issuecomment-490904185
title: Deep csv phase ii fix
